code: @Override protected void verify() {     assertThat("Camel CDI hasn't stopped Camel context!", UnstoppedCamelContext.isStopCalled, is(equalTo(true))). }

@Test public void sendMessageToInbound(@Uri("direct:start") ProducerTemplate inbound, @Uri("mock:result") MockEndpoint outbound) throws InterruptedException {     outbound.expectedMessageCount(1).     outbound.expectedBodiesReceived("test").     inbound.sendBody("test").     assertIsSatisfied(2L, TimeUnit.SECONDS, outbound). }
@Override public void stop() throws Exception {     super.stop().     isStopCalled = true. }
